content.text: Hey good! I'm excited for the weekend, are you doing anything fun?
I'm going to go hiking with some friends. I'm not a morning person, but I love the fresh air and exercise!
That sounds fun! I'm not a morning person either, but I'm trying to get better. I went to the beach with my family this weekend and it was amazing!
That sounds awesome! I love the beach. I'm from the Midwest, but I've lived all over the country.
I'm from Alabama, but I've lived in a few different places too. I'm a geology major at Alabama University.
That's cool! I'm a nurse. I'm thinking about getting a new crib for my baby.
Oh congrats! I'm sure you'll be a great parent. I'm not sure if I want kids yet, but I'm open to it.
Thanks! I'm excited to be a mom. It's a big change, but I think I'm ready for it.
I'm sure you'll be great. What kind of crib are you thinking about getting?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still doing research. I want something that's safe and comfortable for my baby.
That's important. I'm sure you'll find the perfect crib
